alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 03 at 3:28PM HST until March 04 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... .An upper level trough passing over the islands will maintain very strong summit winds this evening. Winds will decline late tonight and Friday. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 45 mph, strongest this evening. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
